traits.name: Endless Endurance
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self. On every {1;0} {Retaliates}: Additionally cleanses {1;1} {Corruption} from self.'

traits.name: Mesmerize
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {Redirect} to self.'

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Protector
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Redirect}, allies gain +{0;0} {Defense} and +{1;0} {Shielding}.

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Return To Aether
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Generates {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Safeguard
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than {0} {Shield}: {Shields} self equal to the difference.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: 'At the start of combat: Applies {0;1} {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: True Grit
traits.description: 'Whenever {Redirect} is applied to this monster: {Shields} self for {1}.'

traits.name: Aether Breath
traits.description: 'For every {0} Aether consumed by allies: Applies {1} {Power} to this monster and triggers an {Attack} against all enemies for [3] x [2] {Wild damage}.'

traits.name: Magnus Hit
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Deals a [Hit] with damage equal to the total amount of {Power} in the party.'

traits.name: Meditation
traits.description: 'On every {0} {Support Actions}: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Momentum
traits.description: 'On every {0} {Attacks}: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Overwhelming Heat
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Applies {1} Burn to target enemy for every {Power} stack on this monster.'

traits.name: Peak Calamity
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Power} to that ally.'

traits.name: Power Generator
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Power} applied to allies: Generates [1] {random Aether}.'

traits.name: Power Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to this monster: Heals each ally for {1}.'

traits.name: Prime Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Serpentine Maneuvers
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Hits] evaded by your allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Support Attacks
traits.description: '{On Support Action}: Deals a {3} damage [Hit] to {target enemy} and triggers {On Attack} effects.'

traits.name: Tainted Power
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to an ally: Applies {Power} and {1;1} {Affliction} to them. '

traits.name: Age Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Applies {Age} to all allies with {Age}.'

traits.name: Assault Shield
traits.description: '{On Crit}: {Shields} the ally with the lowest amount of {Shield} for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Desire
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Burn} applied to enemies: {Shields} all allies for {1}.'

traits.name: Cosmic Absorption
traits.description: 'For every {0} damage absorbed by {Shields} on allies: Generates {Wild} Aether.'

traits.name: Emergency Response
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: {Shields} all allies for {1}; triggers one more time for allies with {C0%} or less health.'

traits.name: Permafrost
traits.description: Instead of {Shields} on allies vanishing at the start of your turn, half of all {Shields} are retained, rounded up.

traits.name: Shield Hit
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Deals a [Hit] with damage equal to half this monster''s {Shield}, rounded up.'

traits.name: Shielding Winds
traits.description: '{On Wind Action from any ally}: {Shields} each ally for {1}.'

traits.name: Tactical Shields
traits.description: Allies with [7] or more {Shield} gain +{1} {Damage} and +{1;0%} {Crit Chance}.

traits.name: Toxic Shielding
traits.description: 'Whenever {Shield} is applied to an ally: Applies {Poison} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Poison}.'
